dict.string: The essential idea in all cells regarding how DNA is transformed into a functional product
A molecule that is structured as a double helix. Composed of 2 strands with the bases A, T, G, and C
A set of 2 bases bonded together. Possible pairs in DNA include A to T, G and C. Possible pairs in RNA include A to U and G to C.
The transofmration of DNA to RNA. Requires specific cell machinery to convert
A single stranded molecule extremely similar to DNA. Composed of 2 strands with the bases A, U, G, and C. Has many possible shapes due to the lack of a second stabilizing strand.
A sequence of 3 RNA bases that code for an amino acid. Multiple codons when linked together form a protein.
